name: Better Than Chocolate
summary_text: Maggie, 19, works at a lesbian/LGBT bookstore. Her mom's getting divorced and has invited herself to stay with Maggie. Maggie hasn't told her, she's lesbian. Her new girlfriend moves in as well.

name: Hamilton: I nationens intresse
summary_text: Swedish agent Hamilton tracks 200 stolen grenades to Russians at the Uzbek/Afghan border. Some men kill both dealers and buyers and steal the grenades. Who are they and what do they want with the grenades?

name: Space Station 76
summary_text: A 1970s version of the future, where personalities and asteroids collide.

name: Kaala
summary_text: Kaala is about the life of Nellai / Tirunelveli based Tamils who live in large number in Mumbai.

name: The Fallen Idol
summary_text: A butler working in a foreign embassy in London falls under suspicion when his wife accidentally falls to her death, the only witness being an impressionable young boy.

name: Knight Moves
summary_text: During a chess tournament, grand master Peter is suspected of murdering Debi after sex. He helps the police as the murders continue.

name: Connie and Carla
summary_text: A mob mix-up in Chicago sends two chanteuses screaming for L.A., where they score a perfect gig: posing as drag queens on the dinner theater/cabaret circuit. Things get extra-weird when a guy falls for one of the girls.

name: Appleseed Alpha
summary_text: A tough, cute woman and a cyborg arrive at a depopulated, post WW3 Times Sq. They leave the ruins of NYC with 2 on a secret mission.

name: Pokemon 4Ever: Celebi - Voice of the Forest
summary_text: Ash must stop a hunter who forces the mythical Pokémon Celebi to help him destroy a forest.

name: Taking Care of Business
summary_text: An uptight advertising exec has his entire life in a filofax organizer which mistakenly ends up in the hands of a friendly convict who poses as him.

name: The Champ
summary_text: Billy Flynn is an ex-champion boxer who was KO'd by booze and gambling. When the wealthy, estranged mother of his young son begins trying to lure the boy away from him, Flynn must return to the ring to provide for his child.

name: Les infidèles
summary_text: A series of short films set around the theme of infidelity.

name: Peace, Love & Misunderstanding
summary_text: An uptight New York City lawyer takes her two teenagers to her hippie mother's farmhouse upstate for a family vacation.

name: Santuri
summary_text: Not being able to work because of the religious country's prejudice against music, a talented Santour player has to deal with poverty, addiction and the absence of his ex-wife.

name: Baran
summary_text: In a building site in present-day Tehran, Lateef, a 17-year-old Turkish worker is irresistibly drawn to Rahmat, a young Afghan worker. The revelation of Rahmat's secret changes both their lives.

name: Dave Chappelle: For What It's Worth
summary_text: Chappelle cuts loose in what he does best, Chappelle-style! And for what it's worth, no one is safe from Dave!

name: Jägarna
summary_text: A Stockholm cop moves back home to his brother near Norway and Finland. He investigates out of control deer poaching. He confiscates rifles with no permits. Everybody, even his brother and local cops, are against him. Things escalate.

name: In Search of a Midnight Kiss
summary_text: Broke and alone on New Year's Eve, Wilson just wants to spend the rest of a very bad year in bed. But, when his best friend convinces him to post a personal ad, he meets a woman bent on finding the right guy to be with at midnight.

name: Hoot
summary_text: A young man (Lerman) moves from Montana to Florida with his family, where he's compelled to engage in a fight to protect a population of endangered owls.

name: Guilty by Suspicion
summary_text: David Merrill (Robert De Niro), a fictitious 1950s Hollywood Director, returns from filming abroad in France to find that his loyalty has been called into question by the House Committee on...                See full summary »

name: The Set-Up
summary_text: Expecting the usual loss, a boxing manager takes bribes from a betting gangster without telling his fighter.

name: The Music Never Stopped
summary_text: Tale of a father who struggles to bond with his estranged son Gabriel, after Gabriel suffers from a brain tumor that prevents him from forming new memories. With Gabriel unable to shed the ...                See full summary »

name: Mostly Martha
summary_text: When a headstrong chef takes charge of her equally stubborn 8-year-old niece, the tensions between them mount... until an Italian sous-chef arrives to lighten the mood.

name: Simon
summary_text: A mild-mannered gay dentist and a hedonist womanizer rekindle their unlikely friendship when the latter's terminal cancer drives them back together after a decade apart.

name: 321 Action
summary_text: The events of the film revolve around a solitary actress devoted to caring for her daughter, but she decides to retire and return to acting through a new movie, and many comedic ironies occur during the filming of this new movie.

name: Wedlock
summary_text: A male prison escapee heads for his hidden loot electronically attached to a female prisoner.

name: The Rose
summary_text: The tragic life of a self-destructive female rock star who struggles to deal with the constant pressures of her career and the demands of her ruthless business manager.

name: Death Note: L Change the World
summary_text: A spin-out sequel to the popular Japanese thriller. This time it focuses on the character "L."

name: The Order
summary_text: A playboy criminal contacts his dad after stealing a Faberge egg. Later it seems his dad has gone missing in Israel so he heads there. His disappearance is linked to the religious sect: The Order. Lots of fight and chase scenes.

name: Bend of the River
summary_text: When a town boss confiscates homesteader's supplies after gold is discovered nearby, a tough cowboy risks his life to try and get it to them.

name: Tin Men
summary_text: A minor car accident drives two rival aluminum-siding salesmen to the ridiculous extremes of man versus man in 1963 Baltimore.

name: Fúsi
summary_text: Fusi, a 43 year old man, still lives with his mother. His daily life is characterized by monotonous routine. The appearance of vibrant Sjöfn and young neighbour Hera will upset his old bachelor habits.

name: The Adventures of Huck Finn
summary_text: In Missouri, during the 1840s, young Huck Finn fearful of his drunkard father and yearning for adventure, leaves his foster family and joins with runaway slave Jim in a voyage down the Mississippi River toward slavery free states.

name: Mardaani 2
summary_text: A 21-year old boy Sunny has a penchant for sexually assaulting and killing girls. He's locked horns with top cop Shivani Shivaji Roy. Will she nab him?

name: The Hotel New Hampshire
summary_text: The film talks about a family that weathers all sorts of disasters and keeps going in spite of it all. It is noted for its wonderful assortment of oddball characters.

name: Hababam Sinifi Dokuz Doguruyor
summary_text: A son of a tribe chef comes to the class, and he declares himself as a landowner. At the same time, a girl who has a boyfriend in the class gets pregnant. This is the funny and dramatic story of a class.

name: The Beast of Yucca Flats
summary_text: A defecting Soviet scientist is hit by a nuclear explosion near Yucca Flats and roams around as a beast.

name: Tokyo Drifter
summary_text: After his gang disbands, a yakuza enforcer looks forward to life outside of organized crime but soon must become a drifter after his old rivals attempt to assassinate him.

name: The Cured
summary_text: A disease that turns people into zombies has been cured. The once-infected zombies are discriminated against by society and their own families, which causes social issues to arise. This leads to militant government interference.

name: Sidekicks
summary_text: A bullied teen who fantasizes about being Chuck Norris' sidekick trains in martial arts to fulfill his dreams.

name: Accidental Love
summary_text: A small town waitress gets a nail accidentally lodged in her head causing unpredictable behavior that leads her to Washington, D.C., where sparks fly when she meets a clueless young senator who takes up her cause - but what happens when love interferes with what you stand for?

name: Where the Sidewalk Ends
summary_text: Det. Sgt. Mark Dixon wants to be something his old man wasn't: a guy on the right side of the law. Will Dixon's vicious nature get the better of him?

name: Gregory's Girl
summary_text: Gregory is a normal teen who is infatuated with a classmate. He must work to win her affection.

name: Uppi 2
summary_text: A psychological thriller which depicts the fact that "Today is a gift - that's why it's called Present" in an unusual way. It is about a man called Neenu, who lives in the present. The film...                See full summary »

name: The King's Choice
summary_text: April 1940. Norway has been invaded by Germany and the royal family and government have fled into the interior. The German envoy to Norway tries to negotiate a peace. Ultimately, the decision on Norway's future will rest with the King.

name: The Big Clock
summary_text: A magazine tycoon commits a murder and pins it on an innocent man, who then tries to solve the murder himself.

name: Blow Dry
summary_text: In 2000, a small town hosts The British Hairdressing Championship, where a former 2-time winner, his son, his run-away wife and his runaway wife's lady lover reside (not all on speaking terms).

name: Bed of Roses
summary_text: Romantic drama about a young career girl who is swept off her feet by a shy florist, who fell in love with her after one glimpse through a shadowy window.

name: House of Good and Evil
summary_text: After a family tragedy in the chaotic city, Chris and Maggie Conley, in a last-ditch effort to save their dying marriage, purchase an isolated home in the deepest woods, to which they quickly discover evil has a key.

name: Donovan's Reef
summary_text: Comedy subtly dealing with moral issues such as racial bigotry, corporate greed, American belief of societal superiority and hypocrisy.

name: Swiri
summary_text: South Korean agents Ryu and Lee are tracking a female assassin from North Korea who has mysteriously disappeared. With new killings and the theft of a deadly bomb, time is running out to catch her.

name: The Decline of the American Empire
summary_text: Sexual revelations emerge when a group of academics and their partners spend a weekend at a country retreat.

name: Poker Night
summary_text: When a new detective is caught by a vicious psychopath and locked in a basement, he must use the knowledge he learned from some of the best detectives at Poker Night, then match wits against his captor.

name: I Can't Think Straight
summary_text: A young woman engaged to be married finds her life changed forever when she meets her best friend's girlfriend.

name: Piranha II: The Spawning
summary_text: A scuba diving instructor, her biochemist boyfriend, and her police chief ex-husband try to link a series of bizarre deaths to a mutant strain of piranha fish whose lair is a sunken freighter ship off a Caribbean island resort.

name: Sissi
summary_text: In the first of a trilogy of movies about Elisabeth "Sissi" of Austria, the young vibrant princess catches the eye of her sister's fiancé, Emperor Franz Josef.

name: Secret Agent
summary_text: After three British Agents are assigned to assassinate a mysterious German spy during World War I, two of them become ambivalent when their duty to the mission conflicts with their consciences.

name: The Pope of Greenwich Village
summary_text: Two cousins unknowingly rob the mob and face the dangerous consequences.

name: The Cat's Meow
summary_text: Semi-true story of the Hollywood murder that occurred at a star-studded gathering aboard William Randolph Hearst's yacht in 1924.

name: Fat City
summary_text: Two men, working as professional boxers, come to blows when their careers each begin to take opposite momentum.

name: Miami Blues
summary_text: An ex-con's first act of freedom is moving to Miami where he restarts his old criminal ways with even more potency.

name: Strangers with Candy
summary_text: A prequel to the critically-acclaimed series featuring Jerri Blank, a 46-year-old ex-junkie ex-con who returns to high school in a bid to restart her life.

name: The Call of Cthulhu
summary_text: While sorting the affairs of his late Uncle, a man accidentally stumbles across a series of dark secrets connected to an ancient horror waiting to be freed.

name: Houseboat
summary_text: A widower, his three young children, and a bombshell nanny get to know each other better when circumstances have them living together aboard a badly neglected houseboat.

name: Elementarteilchen
summary_text: Two half brothers in Berlin, 30+, one an introverted scientist, the other a sexually frustrated teacher, have no love life. That's about to change.

name: George Washington
summary_text: A group of children, in a depressed small town, band together to cover up a tragic mistake one summer.

name: Delirious
summary_text: A soap opera writer gets hit on the head and wakes up as a character in his own show.

name: Godzilla: Planet of the Monsters
summary_text: A desperate group of refugees attempts to recolonize Earth 20,000 years after Godzilla took over, but one young man wants revenge above all else.

name: Serious Moonlight
summary_text: A high-powered attorney duct tapes her adulterous husband to the toilet ... right before their home is invaded by burglars.

name: Blink
summary_text: Emma, a blind violinist who had recently undergone a revolutionary surgery, joins with a police detective to track a serial killer after she was an inadvertent witness to his latest crime.

name: Zoe
summary_text: A story about how synthetic humans can feel and even love and how the people they are involved with react to this concept.

name: Vampires vs. the Bronx
summary_text: A group of young friends from the Bronx fight to save their neighborhood from gentrification...and vampires.

name: Une nouvelle amie
summary_text: A young woman makes a surprising discovery about the husband of her late best friend.

name: Brutti, sporchi e cattivi
summary_text: Four generations of a family live in a shantytown in the outskirts of Rome. The household engages in various forms of sexual idiosyncrasies, land swindles, incest, drugs and adultery.

name: Crystal Fairy y el cactus mágico
summary_text: As Jamie travels in Chile, he invites an eccentric woman to join his group's quest to score a fabled hallucinogen, a move that finds him at odds with his new companion, until they drink the magic brew on a beach at the edge of the desert.

name: Zombie Nation
summary_text: A psychotic police officer who murders his female arrestees gets what's coming to him when a horde of zombified women rise from their graves to seek revenge.

name: Bullet
summary_text: Paroled after 8 years in prison, Bullet's picked up by his brother and a friend. Bullet assaults a drug dealer and two customers. Things escalate.

name: Pandemic
summary_text: A New York doctor travels with her team to Los Angeles to find survivors of a worldwide pandemic.

name: In Secret
summary_text: Thérèse grows up with her aunt and cousin. Around 1860 the aunt decides they move to Paris and that her son and Thérèse get married. The joy- and loveless life changes when her husband brings a friend home. The affair turns ugly for all.

name: Godzilla: Final Wars
summary_text: Godzilla's fiftieth Anniversary project, in which Godzilla travels around the world to fight his old foes and his allies plus a new, mysterious monster named Monster X.

name: Cirque du Soleil: Worlds Away
summary_text: A young woman is entranced by an Aerialist. When they fall into the dreamlike world of Cirque du Soleil and are separated, they travel through the different tent worlds trying to find each other.

name: We Are the Night
summary_text: In Berlin, a cop closes in on an all-female vampire trio who just took in a new member, Lena.

name: Jailhouse Rock
summary_text: After serving time for manslaughter, young Vince Everett becomes a teenage rock star.

name: Antikörper
summary_text: Wanted for a long time, serial killer Gabriel Engel gets arrested in a spectacular police raid. Small town cop Michael Martens travels to the big city to interrogate him and finds out more than he is looking for.

name: Leonard Part 6
summary_text: Secret Agent Leonard Parker (Bill Cosby) is called out of retirement to save the world from evil genius Medusa Johnson (Gloria Foster).

name: Happy Christmas
summary_text: After a break up, Jenny moves in with writer Kelly, her filmmaker husband, and their child. Despite a rocky start, Jenny's influence helps Kelly realize that an evolution in her life, career and relationship is necessary for her happiness.

name: My Name Is Joe
summary_text: Two thirtysomethings, unemployed former alcoholic Joe and community health worker Sarah, start a romantic relationship in the one of the toughest Glasgow neighbourhoods.

name: First Snow
summary_text: A psychic's ominous reading sends a man into a tailspin.

name: One Million Years B.C.
summary_text: Prehistoric man Tumak is banished from his savage tribe and meets pretty Loana, who belongs to a gentler coastal tribe but he must fight caveman Payto to win her favors.

name: Robot Chicken: Star Wars
summary_text: The first of three Star Wars themed Robot Chicken parodies.

name: Heaven Knows, Mr. Allison
summary_text: During World War II, an American marine and an Irish nun form an unlikely friendship after being stranded on a South Pacific island. They find comfort in one another as the two hope for a rescue.

name: Teen Spirit
summary_text: Violet is a shy teenager who dreams of escaping her small town and pursuing her passion to sing. With the help of an unlikely mentor, she enters a local singing competition that will test her integrity, talent and ambition. Driven by a pop-fueled soundtrack, Teen Spirit is a visceral and stylish spin on the Cinderella story.

name: Bai ri yan huo
summary_text: An ex cop and his ex partner decide to follow up on investigation of a series of murders that ended their careers and shamed them, when identical murders begin again.

name: Five Fingers
summary_text: In Morocco to assist with the creation of a food charity, a Dutchman is abducted by a terrorist.

name: Broken Arrow
summary_text: Tom Jeffords tries to make peace between settlers and Apaches in Arizona territory.

name: Duma
summary_text: An orphaned cheetah becomes the best friend and pet of a young boy living in South Africa.

name: Accattone
summary_text: A pimp with no other means to provide for himself finds his life spiraling out of control when his prostitute is sent to prison.

name: The Objective
summary_text: A military special operations team, led by a CIA case officer, are on a mission in the harsh and hostile terrain of Afghanistan where they find themselves in a Middle Eastern "Bermuda Triangle" of ancient evil.

name: Rolling Thunder
summary_text: A returning war veteran loses his family to a violent home invasion and decides to seek and retaliate against those responsible.

name: Le Boucher
summary_text: An unlikely friendship between a dour, working class butcher and a repressed schoolteacher coincides with a grisly series of Ripper-type murders in a provincial French town.

name: The Cowboy Way
summary_text: Two childhood friends who are rodeo cowboys travel from New Mexico to New York City searching for a friend who disappeared while looking for his daughter, who's just been smuggled into the US from Cuba.

name: Khaali Peeli
summary_text: Follows a taxi driver who picks up a girl while he is on the run and ends up in a crazy roller-coaster of events.

name: Paris Can Wait
summary_text: The wife of a successful movie producer takes a car trip from the south of France to Paris with one of her husband's associates.

name: Standoff
summary_text: A young girl photographs an assassin killing 4 at a cemetery. He wants no witnesses. Carter, a veteran in a farmhouse, is all standing between him and the girl.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Wrath of the Dragon
summary_text: A mysterious being named Hoy arrives on Earth and asks the Z Warriors to use the dragon balls to help him release Tapion. Tapion, an ancient warrior imprisoned in a music box, and Hoy needs...                See full summary »

name: Le Week-end
summary_text: A British couple return to Paris many years after their honeymoon there in an attempt to rejuvenate their marriage.

name: Boogeyman 2
summary_text: A young woman attempts to cure her phobia of the boogeyman by checking herself into a mental health facility, only to realize too little too late that she is now helplessly trapped with her own greatest fear.

name: Save the Green Planet!
summary_text: Byeong-gu believes that the world is on the verge of an alien invasion, and sets out to save the world.

name: Miyamoto Musashi
summary_text: Depicts the early life of the legendary warrior Musashi Miyamoto; his years as an aspiring warrior, an outlaw and finally a true samurai.

name: Poultrygeist: Night of the Chicken Dead
summary_text: Zombified chickens attempt to kill the fast-food workers that cook them in a restaurant built on an ancient burial ground.

name: Pinocchio
summary_text: Despite guidance from the Blue Fairy and the love of his father, a wooden puppet's curious spirit leads him into one wild adventure after another.

name: Loves of a Blonde
summary_text: A factory manager in rural Czechoslovakia bargains with the army to send men to the area, to boost the morale of his young female workers, deprived of male company since the local boys have...                See full summary »

name: Les Lyonnais
summary_text: After growing up in a poor gypsy camp, Edmond Vidal, aka Momon, has retained a sense of family, unfailing loyalty and pride in his origins. Most of all, he has remained friends with Serge ...                See full summary »

name: The Whiskey Bandit
summary_text: A rootless young man in Ceausescu's Romania crosses the Hungarian border looking for a better future. With his back against the wall in the post-socialist turmoil, he becomes the most successful bank robber in Hungarian history.

name: Othello
summary_text: The Moorish General Othello is manipulated into thinking that his new wife Desdemona has been carrying on an affair with his Lieutenant Michael Cassio when in reality, it is all part of the scheme of a bitter Ensign named Iago.

name: Monster a Go-Go
summary_text: A space capsule crash-lands on Earth, and the astronaut aboard disappears. Is there a connection between the missing man and the monster roaming the area?

name: 10x10
summary_text: A man abducts a flower shop owner and holds her captive in a small, soundproof room in an effort to extract a dark secret from her past.

name: Bu Neng Shuo De. Mi Mi
summary_text: Ye Xiang Lun, a talented piano player is a new student at the prestigious Tamkang School. On his first day, he meets Lu Xiao Yu, a pretty girl playing a mysterious piece of music.

name: Kull the Conqueror
summary_text: A barbarian warrior becomes a king when he defeats a king in armed combat and the king's heir conspire to overthrow him and reclaim the throne by resurrecting an evil sorceress.

name: Straight Time
summary_text: After being released on parole, a career burglar assaults his former probation officer, returns to a life of crime, and goes on the run.

name: Don't Move
summary_text: A destitute woman (Cruz) becomes involved with an upper-crust physician (Castellitto).

name: No Escape
summary_text: A social media personality travels with his friends to Moscow to capture new content for his successful VLOG. Always pushing the limits and catering to a growing audience, they enter a cold world of mystery, excess, and danger.

name: Private Resort
summary_text: The story of two adolescent boys who are guests at a Florida resort for the week-end. Their only interest is, of course, chasing girls, but fate has much more in store for them.

name: High Flying Bird
summary_text: During a pro basketball lockout, a sports agent pitches a rookie basketball client on an intriguing and controversial business proposition.

name: Dark Blue Almost Black
summary_text: Just as his childhood sweetheart Natalia returns, his infertile brother Antonio asks Jorge to impregnate Paula, Antonio's imprisoned girlfriend.

name: Toolbox Murders
summary_text: A historic Hollywood hotel houses a supernatural evil. It's been subdued for decades, but when renovations start, a series of murders take place.

name: Boo! A Madea Halloween
summary_text: Madea lands in the midst of mayhem when she spends a haunted Halloween fending off killers, paranormal poltergeists, ghosts, ghouls, and zombies while keeping a watchful eye on her wild teenage great-niece.

name: Out in the Dark
summary_text: A drama centered on the love affair between two men on opposite sides of the Mid-East conflict: Palestinian student Nimer and Roy, an Israeli lawyer.

name: Desk Set
summary_text: Two extremely strong personalities clash over the computerization of a television network's research department.

name: Age of Uprising: The Legend of Michael Kohlhaas
summary_text: In the 16th century in the Cévennes, a horse dealer by the name of Michael Kohlhaas leads a happy family life. When a lord treats him unjustly, he raises an army and puts the country to fire and sword in order to have his rights restored.

name: Mr. Majestyk
summary_text: A melon farmer battles organized crime and a hit man who wants to kill him.

name: Good Dick
summary_text: A look at the relationship between a lonely introverted girl and a young video store clerk vying for her attention.

name: Bent
summary_text: In 1930s Berlin, a gay Jew is sent to a concentration camp under the Nazi regime.

name: Saturday Night and Sunday Morning
summary_text: A rebellious, hard-living factory worker juggles relationships with two women, one of whom is married to another man but pregnant with his child.

name: The Dogs of War
summary_text: Mercenary James Shannon, on a reconnaissance job to the African nation of Zangaro, is tortured and deported. He returns to lead a coup.

Three college friends hit the biggest party of the year, where a mysterious phenomenon disrupts the night, quickly descending into a chaos that challenges their friendships - and whether they can stay alive.

name: Phase IV
summary_text: Desert ants suddenly form a collective intelligence and begin to wage war on the inhabitants. It is up to two scientists and a stray girl they rescue from the ants to destroy them.

name: Yours, Mine and Ours
summary_text: A widower with ten children falls for a widow with eight, and they must decide about forming a huge, unconventional family.

name: Intersection
summary_text: While driving on a remote highway, a man is torn between choosing to reunite with his estranged wife or taking up with his lovers

name: Ragnarok
summary_text: Norwegian archaeologist Sigurd Svendsen forms a small team and sets off to find the true meaning of the secret runes found carved in rock and accidentally awakens a giant monster.

name: Admiral
summary_text: The story of admiral Aleksandr Kolchak who remained faithful to his oath to the Russian Emperor and fought against the Bolshevik rule after the 1917 October Revolution.

name: Laid to Rest
summary_text: A young girl wakes up in a casket with a head injury and no memory of her identity. She quickly realizes she was abducted by a serial killer and she must fight to survive.

name: The Face of Another
summary_text: A businessman with a disfigured face obtains a lifelike mask from his doctor, but the mask starts altering his personality.

name: Lost Bullet
summary_text: A small time delinquent, turned police mechanic for a go fast task force, is forced to defend his innocence when his mentor is killed by dirty cops.

name: Khoobsurat
summary_text: A hopelessly romantic physiotherapist meets a handsome young Rajput prince who is the complete opposite of her and engaged to someone else.

name: Hell in the Pacific
summary_text: During World War II, an American pilot and a marooned Japanese navy captain are deserted on a small uninhabited island in the Pacific Ocean. There, they must cease their hostility and cooperate if they want to survive, but will they?

name: Madame Bovary
summary_text: Bored in her marriage to a country doctor and stifled by life in a small town, the restless Emma Bovary pursues her dreams of passion and excitement, whatever they may cost.

name: Rugrats Go Wild
summary_text: The Rugrats get tangled in an exotic adventure, where they're helped by the Thornberrys, a family that travels the world making nature documentaries.

name: A Murder of Crows
summary_text: A disbarred lawyer takes credit for a late friend's book, which becomes a smash hit but the tables turn on him sooner than he suspected.

name: Heavy Trip
summary_text: Turo (25) is trying to overcome his fears by leading the most unknown heavy metal band in Finland, Impaled Rektum, to the hottest metal festival of Norway. The journey includes heavy metal,...                See full summary »

name: Zweiohrküken
summary_text: Ludo Decker and Anna Gotzlowski have been living together for two years. Everyday routine has set in, with Ludo neglecting his household responsibilities much to Anna's dislike, while he is...                See full summary »

name: Confidential Report
summary_text: An elusive billionaire hires an American smuggler to investigate his past, leading to a dizzying descent into a cold-war European landscape.

name: 10 Rillington Place
summary_text: Based on the real-life case of the British serial killer John Christie, and what happened to his neighbors Tim and Beryl Evans.

name: Bubble
summary_text: Set against the backdrop of a decaying Midwestern town, a murder becomes the focal point of three people who work in a doll factory.

name: The Meteor Man
summary_text: A high school teacher from a troubled inner city Washington D.C. neighborhood becomes a super-powered hero and takes on the gang that has been terrorizing his streets.

name: Miss Meadows
summary_text: A story centered on a proper elementary school teacher who moonlights as a vigilante.

name: Children of the Corn II: The Final Sacrifice
summary_text: A journalist and his son travel to Nebraska to investigate the mysterious town of Gatlin where, unbeknownst to them, a murderous cult of children are still waiting in the corn fields.

name: Ghost Story
summary_text: Two generations of men find themselves haunted by the presence of a spectral woman. When the son of one of the elderly men returns to his hometown after his brother's mysterious death, they attempt to unravel her story.

name: Minuscule: Valley of the Lost Ants
summary_text: Somewhere in the forest, a stranded ladybug joins forces with a squad of black ants to retrieve a tin box of delicious sugar cubes to the hive. A battalion of fierce red ants has already set their sights on the loot. Who shall prevail?

name: The In-Laws
summary_text: On the eve of their children's marriage, NYC in-laws Sheldon Kornpett and Vince Ricardo embark on a series of misadventures involving the CIA, the Treasury Department and Central American dictators.

name: Still Crazy
summary_text: Fame, fortune and fornication drove the British rock band in the '70s until a divine end. 20 years later, Strange Fruit reunites and goes on a tour with ups and downs on the continent.

name: Criss Cross
summary_text: An armored truck driver and his ex-wife conspire with a gang to have his own truck robbed on the route.

name: Heavy Metal 2000
summary_text: After surviving an invasion on her peaceful homeworld, a beautiful avenger must stop a powerful psychopath from gaining immortality and rescue her kidnapped sister.

name: Missing in Action 2: The Beginning
summary_text: Prequel to the first Missing In Action, set in the early 1980s it shows the capture of Colonel Braddock during the Vietnam war in the 1970s, and his captivity with other American POWs in a brutal prison camp, and his plans to escape.

name: La mafia uccide solo d'estate
summary_text: Inspired by real events, this is a black comedy about 20 years of history of Sicily from 1970s to 1990s, mocking Mafia Bosses and restoring the generosity of the heroes of Antimafia. It's ...                See full summary »

name: Faraway, So Close!
summary_text: A group of angels in the German capital look longingly upon the life of humans.

name: Summertime
summary_text: An American spinster's dream of romance finally becomes a bittersweet reality when she meets a handsome--but married--Italian man while vacationing in Venice.

name: Hammer of the Gods
summary_text: A young man transforms into a brutal warrior as he travels the unforgiving landscape in search of his long lost brother, Hakan the Ferocious, whose people are relying on him to restore order to their kingdom.

name: Godzilla 2000: Millennium
summary_text: An independent group of researchers actively track Godzilla as a giant meteor is discovered. The mysterious rock begins to levitate as it's true intentions for the world and Godzilla are revealed.

name: Unrest
summary_text: A young pathology med student suspects that the spirit of a dead cadaver in the hospital morgue where she works is killing off all those who handle or desecrate the body.

name: King of the Hill
summary_text: A young boy struggles on his own in a run-down motel after his parents and younger brother are separated from him in 1930s Depression-era Midwest.

name: The Krays
summary_text: This fact-based movie follows the life of the twin crime-lords in London's '60s underworld.

name: Locked Down
summary_text: A couple attempts a high-risk, high-stakes jewelry heist at a department store.

name: Lucifer
summary_text: A political Godfather dies and a lot of thieves dressed up as politicians took over the rule. Question arises regarding the successor of the God, unfolding few names, along with the God's most beloved angel, Lucifer.

name: Initial D
summary_text: After winning his first competition, Takumi focuses his attention on drift racing, a sport he has unknowingly perfected while delivering tofu in his father's Toyota AE86.

name: The Troops & Aliens
summary_text: In St. Tropez, French gendarme Cruchot and his men battle petroleum-drinking, human-looking, metallic aliens.

name: The Countess
summary_text: A 17th century Hungarian countess embarks on a murderous undertaking, with the belief that bathing in the blood of virgins will preserve her beauty.

name: Hara-Kiri: Death of a Samurai
summary_text: A tale of revenge, honor and disgrace, centering on a poverty-stricken samurai who discovers the fate of his ronin son-in-law, setting in motion a tense showdown of vengeance against the house of a feudal lord.

name: Long men fei jia
summary_text: Set three years after Dragon Inn, innkeeper Jade has disappeared and a new inn has risen from the ashes - one that's staffed by marauders masquerading as law-abiding citizens, who hope to unearth the fabled lost city buried in the desert.

name: I Was a Male War Bride
summary_text: After marrying an American lieutenant with whom he was assigned to work in post-war Germany, a French captain attempts to find a way to accompany her back to the States under the terms of the War Bride Act.

name: Carancho
summary_text: An ambulance chaser/carancho falls for an ER/ambulance doctor, he meets one night "at work" in Buenos Aires.

name: Your Friends and Neighbors
summary_text: Unhappy couples fall apart and hop into other beds with other people.

name: Closet Monster
summary_text: A creative and driven teenager is desperate to escape his hometown and the haunting memories of his turbulent childhood.

name: Blind
summary_text: Forsaken in a new Oslo apartment, a frail blind woman battles to come to terms with her condition, as she slowly retracts into an elaborate fantasy bubble. Are her stories fanning her suspicions, or is this what total blindness looks like?

name: The Hitch-Hiker
summary_text: Two fishermen pick up a psychotic escaped convict who tells them that he intends to murder them when the ride is over.

name: The Cabbage Soup
summary_text: 2 buddy farmers are visited by aliens who like their domestic cabbage soup.

name: ...And God Created Woman
summary_text: In sunny St. Tropez, a young sexpot loves one brother but marries the other.

name: Alice in Wonderland
summary_text: Alice falls down a rabbit hole, and finds herself in Wonderland, a fantasy land of strange characters and ideas.

name: Way Out West
summary_text: Stanley and Ollie are enlisted to deliver the deed to a goldmine in a small village, only for it to be stolen.

name: Beer League
summary_text: An unemployed slacker inspires his softball teammates to improve their game so they won't get kicked out of the local league.

name: Prey
summary_text: An American family on holiday in Africa becomes lost in a game reserve and stalked by lions.

name: Date and Switch
summary_text: Two guys who make a pact to lose their virginity before prom find their friendship tested when one of them comes out of the closet.

name: The Wild Child
summary_text: In a French forest in 1798, a child is found who cannot walk, speak, read or write. A doctor becomes interested in the child and patiently attempts to civilize him.

name: Iron Will
summary_text: A brave young man is thrust into adulthood as he and his courageous team of sled dogs embark on a grueling and treacherous cross-country marathon.

name: Talvisota
summary_text: In 1939, two Finnish brothers are conscripted in the army to fight in the war between Finland and the Soviet Union.

name: The Blue Dahlia
summary_text: An ex-bomber pilot is suspected of murdering his unfaithful wife.

name: Anthony Zimmer
summary_text: Anthony Zimmer was a big money launderer. The police wants him, but he has changed his face and voice. His old Russian clients want him dead. His ex is told to socialize with a random man on the train Paris to Nice.

name: Never Cry Wolf
summary_text: A government researcher, sent to research the "menace" of wolves in the north, learns about the true beneficial and positive nature of the species.

name: The Banishment
summary_text: A trip to the pastoral countryside reveals a dark, sinister reality for a family from the city.

name: Baaghi
summary_text: A martial arts student seeks revenge after the murder of his master.

name: Ju Dou
summary_text: A woman married to the brutal and infertile owner of a dye mill in rural China conceives a boy with her husband's nephew but is forced to raise her son as her husband's heir without revealing his parentage in this circular tragedy.

name: Justice League vs the Fatal Five
summary_text: The Justice League battles the Fatal Five, (Tharok, Emerald Empress, Validus, Mano and the Persuader). Based on the characters created by Jim Shooter.

name: Grace
summary_text: After losing her unborn child, Madeline Matheson insists on carrying the baby to term. Following the delivery, the child miraculously returns to life with an appetite for human blood. Madeline is faced with a mother's ultimate decision.

name: Soul Man
summary_text: To achieve his dream of attending Harvard, a pampered teen poses as a young black man to receive a full scholarship.

name: The Stendhal Syndrome
summary_text: A young policewoman slowly goes insane while tracking down an elusive serial rapist/killer through Italy when she herself becomes a victim of the brutal man's obsession.

name: Psycho IV: The Beginning
summary_text: Norman Bates recalls his childhood with his abusive mother while fearing his unborn child will inherit his split personality disorder.
A musical retelling of the American Revolution's political struggle in the Continental Congress to declare independence.

name: Fred: The Movie
summary_text: Lovestruck, awkward teen Fred Figglehorn makes desperate attempts to make Judy fall in love with him - while also dodging the mischievous Kevin.

name: It's Entertainment
summary_text: Akhil, an underdog and a failure, comes to know that his real father is a rich diamond merchant who has just passed away. When he goes to retrieve his wealth, he learns that a dog has inherited it.

name: Office Uprising
summary_text: An employee at a weapons factory discovers that an energy drink turns his co-workers into zombies

name: Singh Is Bliing
summary_text: A lazy youth failing to take up any responsibility is sent to work with his father's friend in Goa where he meets a woman who has problems of her own.

name: Intruder
summary_text: The overnight stock crew of a local supermarket find themselves being stalked and slashed by a mysterious maniac.

name: Life
summary_text: A photographer for LIFE Magazine is assigned to shoot pictures of James Dean.

name: Prelude to a Kiss
summary_text: A couple fall in love despite the girl's pessimistic outlook. As they struggle to come to terms with their relationship, something supernatural happens that tests it.

name: Coma
summary_text: After a mysterious accident a young architect comes back to his senses in a very odd world. He must find out the exact laws and regulations of it as he fights for his life and keeps on looking for the exit to the real world.

name: Surf Ninjas
summary_text: Two boys learn from a mysterious warrior that they are the heirs to the throne of Patusan and set out to overthrow the current monarchy.

name: The Damned
summary_text: The dramatic collapse of a wealthy, industrialist/Junker family during the reign of the Third Reich.

name: The Assignment
summary_text: After waking up and discovering that he has undergone gender reassignment surgery, an assassin seeks to find the doctor responsible.

name: Looking
summary_text: Patrick returns to San Francisco in search of closure and resolution regarding his relationships with Richie and Kevin.

name: Humshakals
summary_text: A comedy centered around three people who each have a lookalike of a lookalike, all with the same name.

name: Life Happens
summary_text: A comedy centered on two best friends, Kim and Deena, who fight to maintain normalcy in their lives after Kim gets pregnant and has a baby.

name: O Lucky Man!
summary_text: An apprentice coffee salesman has a series of improbable and ironic adventures that seem designed to challenge his naive idealism.

name: Make Way for Tomorrow
summary_text: An elderly couple are forced to live hundreds of miles apart when they lose their house and none of their five children will take both parents in.

name: Rattlesnake
summary_text: When a single mother accepts the help of a mysterious woman after her daughter is bitten by a rattlesnake, she finds herself making an unthinkable deal with the devil to repay the stranger.

name: The Osiris Child
summary_text: Set in the future in a time of interplanetary colonization, an unlikely pair race against an impending global crisis and are confronted by the monsters that live inside us all.

name: An...
summary_text: Under the Athenian night sky, before the silent threat of an imminent socio-economic crisis, a young man goes for a stroll and meets the love of his life. Does fate govern one's existence? What would have happened if he stayed in, instead?

name: Nuns on the Run
summary_text: 2 criminals want out but their boss kills those leaving. When the men are ordered to rob the triad, they keep the money and hide from the boss, triad and police at a convent, dressed as nuns.

name: Brigadoon
summary_text: Two Americans on a hunting trip in Scotland become lost. They encounter a small village, not on the map, called Brigadoon, in which people harbor a mysterious secret, and behave as if they were still living two hundred years in the past.

name: Who Killed Captain Alex?
summary_text: Uganda's president gives Captain Alex the mission to defeat the Tiger Maffia, but Alex gets killed in the process. Upon hearing the tragic news, his brother investigates to avenge Alex.

name: Panique au village
summary_text: Cowboy and Indian's only wish was to come up with a brilliant idea for Mr Horse's birthday, but when their plan ends up in utter disaster, they'll need to travel the world and back to make things right again.

name: Jeanne Dielman, 23, quai du commerce, 1080 Bruxelles
summary_text: A lonely widowed housewife does her daily chores, takes care of her apartment where she lives with her teenage son, and turns the occasional trick to make ends meet. However, something happens that changes her safe routine.

name: Trespass Against Us
summary_text: A man looks to find a way to escape the criminal ways of his outlaw family.

name: The Ax
summary_text: A chemist (Garcia) loses his job to outsourcing. Two years later and still jobless, he hits on a solution: to genuinely eliminate his competition.

name: Stage Door
summary_text: A chronicle of the ambitions, dreams, and disappointments of aspiring actresses who all live in the same boarding house.

name: Kurôzu zero
summary_text: A transfer student attempts to take over the most violent high school in the country, whose students form factions and battle each other for power.

name: Anastasia
summary_text: An opportunistic businessman tries to pass off a mysterious impostor as the Grand Duchess Anastasia, and she is so convincing that even the biggest skeptics believe her.

name: Arn: Riket vid vägens slut
summary_text: The Knight Arn is sent on a last mission against Saladin. He has to win this battle, before he can go home to Sweden, and finally marry his Cecilia and start a family. But the peace back home is threatened by the Danes.

name: Man About Town
summary_text: A top Hollywood talent agent finds his cushy existence threatened when he discovers that his wife is cheating on him and that his journal has been swiped by a reporter out to bring him down.

name: Those Magnificent Men in Their Flying Machines or How I Flew from London to Paris in 25 hours 11 minutes
summary_text: Hoping to push Britain to the forefront of aviation, a London publisher organizes an international air race across the English Channel, but must contend with two entrants vying for his daughter, as well as national rivalries and cheating.

name: Plastic
summary_text: Sam and Fordy run a credit card fraud scheme, but when they steal from the wrong man, they find themselves threatened by a sadistic gangster. They need to raise £2m and pull off a daring diamond heist to clear their debt.

name: The Mercy
summary_text: The incredible story of amateur sailor Donald Crowhurst and his solo attempt to circumnavigate the globe. The struggles he confronted on the journey while his family awaited his return is one of the most enduring mysteries of recent times.

name: A Peck on the Cheek
summary_text: A little girl is told by her parents that she is adopted. Determined to find her real mother, she begs to be taken to Sri Lanka, where her mother works with a militant group of activists.

name: Lawn Dogs
summary_text: When Devon, a 10-year-old girl, forges a friendship with Trent, a 21-year-old outsider who mows the neighborhood lawns, things suddenly get very complicated and private.

name: They Were Expendable
summary_text: A Navy commander fights to prove the battle-worthiness of the PT boat at the start of World War II.

name: Dr. Mabuse, der Spieler
summary_text: Arch-criminal Dr. Mabuse sets out to make a fortune and run Berlin. Detective Wenk sets out to stop him.

name: American Virgin
summary_text: A night of debauchery threatens a sexually abstinent student's college standing.

name: The Long Weekend
summary_text: A comedy about two brothers, uptight Ed and playboy Cooper. Ed has a weekend to save his career, but Cooper has other plans for the weekend; to help his stressed out brother get lucky with the ladies.

name: Beneath Hill 60
summary_text: In 1916, the 1st Australian Tunnelling Company is tunneling beneath German fortifications and bunkers to detonate massive explosive charges.

name: Sakar Sakir
summary_text: After the death of his wealthy uncle, Sakir who is an excessively awkward boy from an Anatolian village starts off to Istanbul to inherit all the properties. However, during journey to ...                See full summary »

name: The House of Yes
summary_text: A mentally unbalanced young woman - who is convinced she is Jackie Kennedy - flies into a murderous rage when her brother returns home to reveal he is engaged.
